desc: Prescott's premier botanical studio and herbal supply shop. Specializing in custom floral design for memorable events, flower delivery, apothecary provisions, earth-based spiritual items, and other oddities for your curious soul!

layout.text: Prescott's Premier Florist and Flower Shop

Come experience a botanical oasis in downtown Prescott, specializing in custom floral design, local flower delivery, holiday gifts, and curated curiosities.
Open 5 days a week, we offer free consultations for event services, locally sourced artisanal goods, and arrangements for every occasion!
522 E. Sheldon St. Prescott AZ 8630
